Garguthesong.mp3:
const rhythmPattern = [5021, 5719, 6405, 7862, 8487, 9166, 10508, 11190, 11856, 13179, 13829, 15044, 15933, 16581, 17253, 17926, 19173, 19916, 20656, 21925, 22624, 23350, 24627, 25299, 26011, 26741, 27390, 28048, 28713, 29461, 30141, 30774, 32038, 32759, 33440, 34101, 35421, 36101, 36771, 37502, 38173, 38870, 39536, 40236, 40893, 41517, 42206, 42861, 43573, 44255, 44926, 45558, 46253, 46928, 47589, 48251, 49619, 51038, 52291, 53637, 55037, 55993, 56507, 57043, 57398, 58701, 59229, 59716, 60101, 61485, 61957, 62415, 62789, 64110, 64644, 65255, 65523, 66757, 69796, 70477, 71210, 71885, 72541, 73197, 73910, 74565, 75236, 75929, 76629, 77269, 77581, 80613, 81257, 82643, 83317, 83961, 85997, 86667, 88717, 89403, 91385, 91948, 93766, 94453, 95078, 95764, 96780, 97476, 99142, 99814, 100526, 101198, 101843];  // Example pattern

shortgarg.mp3:
